panels.visual: Visual: A circular chamber with THREE ANIMATED SWORDS hovering in the air, blades pointed at Lightsword and Darkstorm! Location: Maze - Sword Chamber Characters: Lightsword, Darkstorm, Animated Flying Swords (3)

characters.Lightsword: A GLOWING ETHEREAL FIGURE made entirely of soft golden-white light. NOT a lizard, NOT humanoid with defined features - pure luminous energy in vaguely humanoid shape. No visible face, just two bright points of warm light where eyes would be. The entire body GLOWS and PULSES with inner light. Wearing simple cream-colored ceremonial robes that the light shines through. Ethereal, mysterious, magical being of pure radiance.

panels.visual: Visual: The crystal SHATTERS! The swords fall to the ground, lifeless. Darkstorm sniffs one cautiously. Characters: Lightsword, Darkstorm, fallen swords
panels.dialogue: (SFX): "CRASH! CLATTER-CLATTER-CLATTER!" (Caption): "But past the chamber... a sound. Tiny bells. Or crying."
